title: Prompting Patterns
summary: High-level prompt engineering patterns for advanced model behaviors, including reasoning, self-evaluation, and multistep planning.

patterns.name: ReAct
patterns.description: Combines reasoning (thought) and acting (tool use/API call) for agents that interact with environments.
patterns.use_case: Web browsing, tool-based agents, multi-step APIs.
patterns.example_prompt: Let's think step-by-step and decide what action to take.

patterns.name: Self-Ask
patterns.description: The model asks itself follow-up questions before answering a complex query.
patterns.use_case: Multi-hop question answering, logical deduction tasks.
patterns.example_prompt: Question: Where was Einstein born? â†’ Follow-up: What country is Ulm in?

patterns.name: Tree-of-Thought
patterns.description: Explores multiple reasoning paths in parallel and selects the best outcome.
patterns.use_case: Complex planning, puzzles, brainstorming with selection logic.
patterns.example_prompt: For this problem, explore different ways to approach it and pick the best one.

patterns.name: Generated Knowledge
patterns.description: First generate background knowledge, then solve the task using it.
patterns.use_case: Scientific reasoning, abstract tasks, few-shot extension.
patterns.example_prompt: First, list all relevant facts. Then answer the question.

patterns.name: Self-Consistency
patterns.description: Run multiple outputs for same prompt and pick most frequent answer.
patterns.example_prompt: Let's think step by step and see what answer comes up most often.
